name: Formal Shirt
description: Superdry Formal Shirt is tailored from crisp cotton poplin, delivering a sharp, polished look with a slim-fit design, perfect for boardroom meetings or dinner dates. Detailed with mother-of-pearl buttons and a double-stitched collar, it pairs effortlessly with tailored pants or chinos.
